mainBoard.flavorText: "Only orochi hatched from eggs 'touched by the kami' may become shamans. These days, there are fewer and fewer new shamans being born."

mainBoard.flavorText: "Nothing is the same anymore. The forests are not as lush, the waters not as pure, the air not as clear. Without the kami to direct and sustain the forces of nature, it's only a matter of time before we feel their neglect."

foreignData.flavorText: „Nichts ist gleich geblieben. Die Wälder sind nicht mehr so üppig, die Gewässer nicht mehr so rein, die Luft nicht mehr so klar. Ohne die Kami, die die Mächte der Natur lenken und erhalten, wird es nur eine Frage der Zeit sein, bis wir die Vernachlässigung spüren."
foreignData.name: Orochi-Erhalterin
foreignData.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {G}.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ya nada es lo mismo. Los bosques no son tan frondosos, el agua no es tan pura, el aire no es tan límpido. Sin los kami para dirigir y mantener las fuerzas de la naturaleza, es sólo cuestión de tiempo para que sintamos su abandono."
foreignData.name: Protectora orochi
foreignData.text: {T}: Agrega {G} a tu reserva de maná.

foreignData.flavorText: « Rien n'est plus pareil. Les forêts ont perdu de leur luxuriance, les eaux et l'air, de leur pureté. Sans les kami pour diriger et nourrir les forces de la nature, il nous reste peu de temps avant de ressentir les effets de leur négligence. »
foreignData.name: Nourrisseuse orochi
foreignData.text: {T} : Ajoutez {G} à votre réserve.

foreignData.flavorText: "Niente è più come prima. Le foreste non sono così rigogliose, le acque non sono così pure, l'aria non è così pulita. Senza i kami a dirigere e sorreggere le forze della natura, è solo questione di tempo prima che iniziamo a patire la loro assenza."
foreignData.name: Sostenitore Orochi
foreignData.text: {T}: Aggiungi {G} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreignData.flavorText: 以前と同じものは何も無し。森も前ほど茂らず、水も前ほど清からず、空気も前ほど澄まず。自然に命じ力を与う神なくば、その反感を知ることもなく、時の所以と思ったであろう。

foreignData.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: "Nada é mais o mesmo. As florestas não são mais tão viçosas, as águas não são mais tão puras e o ar não é mais tão limpo. Sem os kamis para guiar e manter as forças da natureza, é apenas uma questão de tempo até que comecemos a sentir sua negligência".

foreignData.flavorText: 「一切都变了。森林不如往昔肥沃，流水不如往昔明澈，空气不如往昔清新。神明不再导引、维护大自然的各种力量，我们很快便将体会遭神遗弃的痛苦。」

foreignData.flavorText: No hay tumbas en el territorio orochi. Los guerreros caídos son enterrados junto con un retoño de árbol, para convertirse en parte del bosque después de la muerte.

foreignData.flavorText: Il n'y avait pas de pierres tombales sur les territoires des orochi. Les guerriers étaient enterrés avec un jeune arbre, pour entrer en communion avec la forêt après leur mort.

foreignData.flavorText: Non c'erano lapidi nei territori orochi. I guerrieri uccisi venivano sepolti insieme al virgulto di un albero, affinché potessero divenire parte della foresta dopo la loro morte.

mainBoard.flavorText: The orochi and the monks had always had an unspoken agreement: live and let live. But when the kami began raging, some warrior youths began questioning that agreement.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Orochi und die Mönche hatten immer eine unausgesprochene Abmachung: leben und leben lassen. Aber als sich die Kami erhoben, begannen einige junge Krieger, diese Abmachung zu hinterfragen.

foreignData.flavorText: Los orochi y los monjes siempre tuvieron un acuerdo tácito: vive y deja vivir. Pero cuando los kami comenzaron sus ataques, algunos jóvenes guerreros comenzaron a cuestionar ese acuerdo.
foreignData.name: Guerreros de la tribu Kashi
foreignData.text: Siempre que los Guerreros de la tribu Kashi hagan daño de combate a una criatura, gírala y esa criatura no se endereza durante el próximo paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignData.flavorText: Les moines et les orochi avaient toujours été d'accord sur un point : vivre et laisser vivre. Mais quand les kami passèrent à l'attaque, les jeunes guerriers commencèrent à s'interroger sur ce principe.
foreignData.name: Guerriers de la tribu Kashi
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que les Guerriers de la tribu Kashi infligent des blessures de combat à une créature, engagez cette créature et elle ne se dégage pas pendant la prochaine étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli orochi e i monaci hanno sempre avuto un tacito accordo: vivi e lascia vivere. Ma quando i kami cominciarono a imperversare, alcuni giovani guerrieri cominciarono a dubitare di questo patto.
foreignData.name: Guerrieri della Tribù-Kashi
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta i Guerrieri della Tribù-Kashi infliggono danno da combattimento a una creatura, TAPpa quella creatura ed essa non STAPpa durante il prossimo STAP del suo controllore.

foreignData.flavorText: 大蛇と僧は、常に生き生かしめることの暗黙の同意を結んでいた。しかし神の怒りが落ちた時、若い戦士の中にはその同意に疑問を持つものが出始めた。

mainBoard.name: Wear Away
mainBoard.originalText:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Splice onto Arcane {3}{G} (As you play an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

rulings.text: A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.name: Lure
mainBoard.originalText: All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

rulings.text: As blockers are declared, any creature that’s tapped or affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having the creature block, no player is forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t block if that cost isn’t paid.
Lure doesn’t give any creatures the ability to block the target creature. It just forces those creatures that are already able to block the creature to do so.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature

foreignData.name: Hankyu
foreignData.text:
La creatura equipaggiata ha "{T}: Metti un segnalino mira su Hankyu" e "{T}, Rimuovi tutti i segnalini mira da Hankyu: Questa creatura infligge a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio un ammontare di danni pari al numero di segnalini mira rimossi."
Equipaggiare {4} ({4}: Assegnalo a una creatura bersaglio che controlli. Equipaggialo solo come una stregoneria.)

foreignData.name: 半弓
foreignData.text:
装備しているクリーチャーは「{T}：半弓の上に照準カウンターを１個置く。」と「{T}, 半弓の上に置かれているすべての照準カウンターを取り除く：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。このクリーチャーはそれに、取り除いた照準カウンターの数に等しい点数のダメージを与える。」の能力を持つ。
装備 {4} （{4}：あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それにつける。装備はソーサリーとしてのみ行う。）
foreignData.type: アーティファクト - 装備品

foreignData.name: Hankyu
foreignData.text:
A criatura equipada tem "{T}: Coloque um marcador de mira em Hankyu" e "{T}, Remova todos os marcadores de mira de Hankyu: Esta criatura causa uma quantidade de dano à critura ou ao jogador alvo igual ao número de marcadores de mira removidos".
Equipar {4} ({4}: Anexe à criatura alvo que você controla. Equipe somente quando puder jogar um feitiço.)

foreignData.name: 半弓
foreignData.text:
佩带此武具的生物具有「{T}：在半弓上放置一个瞄准指示物」与「{T}，从半弓上移去所有瞄准指示物：此生物对目标生物或牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于以此法移去的瞄准指示物数量。」
佩带{4}（{4}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上；佩带的时机视同法术。）

mainBoard.name: Hankyu
mainBoard.originalText:
Equipped creature has "{T}: Put an aim counter on Hankyu" and "{T}, Remove all aim counters from Hankyu: This creature deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of aim counters removed."
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
mainBoard.text:
Equipped creature has "{T}: Put an aim counter on Hankyu" and "{T}, Remove all aim counters from Hankyu: This creature deals damage to any target equal to the number of aim counters removed this way."
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

foreignData.name: Weissagekreisel des Senseis
foreignData.text: {1}: Schaue dir die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek an und lege sie in beliebiger Reihenfolge zurück. {T}: Ziehe eine Karte und lege dann den Weissagekreisel des Senseis oben auf die Bibliothek seines Besitzers.

foreignData.name: Trompo adivinador del sensei
foreignData.text: {1}: Mira las primeras tres cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca, luego regrésalas en cualquier orden. {T}: Roba una carta, luego pon el Trompo adivinador del sensei en la parte superior de la biblioteca de su propietario.

foreignData.name: Toupie de divination du sensei
foreignData.text: {1} : Regardez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque, puis remettez-les dans n'importe quel ordre. {T} : Piochez une carte et mettez ensuite la Toupie de divination du sensei au-dessus de la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.

foreignData.name: Cappa delle Profezie del Sensei
foreignData.text: {1}: Guarda le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio, poi rimettile a posto nell'ordine che preferisci. {T}: Pesca una carta, poi metti la Cappa delle Profezie del Sensei in cima al grimorio del suo proprietario.

foreignData.name: 師範の占い独楽
foreignData.text: {1}：あなたのライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードを見る。その後、それらを望む順番で戻す。{T}：カードを１枚引く。その後、師範の占い独楽をオーナーのライブラリーの一番上に置く。

foreignData.name: Tampo de Adivinhação do Sensei
foreignData.text:
{1}: Olhe os três cards do topo de seu grimório e coloque-os de volta em qualquer ordem.
{T}: Compre um card e depois coloque Tampo de Adivinhação do Sensei no topo de seu grimório.

foreignData.name: 师范占卜陀螺
foreignData.text: {1}：检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。{T}：抓一张牌，然后将师范占卜陀螺置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

mainBoard.name: Sensei's Divining Top
mainBoard.originalText:
{1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

rulings.text: If Sensei’s Divining Top leaves the battlefield while its second ability is on the stack, you’ll draw a card and leave Sensei’s Divining Top in the zone it’s moved to.

Sensei’s Divining Top’s second ability may be activated in response to its first ability. If so, you’ll draw a card, put Sensei’s Divining Top on top of your library, and then look at the top three cards and rearrange them.

mainBoard.text:
{1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

foreignData.name: Junkyo-Glocke
foreignData.text: Du kannst zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, +X/+X erhalten lassen, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, ist. Falls du dies tust, opfere diese Kreatur am Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Campana junkyo
foreignData.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes hacer que la criatura objetivo que controles obtenga +X/+X hasta el final del turno, donde X es la cantidad de criaturas que controles. Si lo haces, sacrifica esa criatura al final del turno.

foreignData.name: Cloche de junkyo
foreignData.text: Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez faire que la créature ciblée que vous contrôlez gagne +X/+X jusqu'à la fin du tour, X étant le nombre de créatures que vous contrôlez. Si vous faites ainsi, sacrifiez cette créature à la fin du tour.

foreignData.name: Campana Junkyo
foreignData.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi far prendere +X/+X a una creatura bersaglio che controlli fino alla fine del turno, dove X è pari al numero di creature che controlli. Se lo fai, sacrifica quella creatura alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: 殉教の鐘
foreignData.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー1体を対象とする。あなたはそれにターン終了時まで＋Ｘ/＋Ｘの修整を受けさせてもよい。Ｘはあなたがコントロールするクリーチャーの総数に等しい。そうした場合、ターン終了時にそのクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる。

foreignData.name: Sino do Junkyo
foreignData.text: No início de sua manutenção, você pode fazer com que a criatura alvo que controla receba +X/+X até o final do turno, sendo X igual ao número de criaturas que você controla. Se o fizer, sacrifique aquela criatura no final do turno.

foreignData.name: 殉教钟
foreignData.text: 在你的维持开始时，你可以使目标由你操控的生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的生物数量。若你如此作，在回合结束时牺牲该生物。

mainBoard.name: Junkyo Bell
mainBoard.originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have target creature you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control. If you do, sacrifice that creature at end of turn.
mainBoard.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have target creature you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control. If you do, sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

mainBoard.name: Forest
mainBoard.originalText: G
